explains: adj. 可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的

sentences.en: Forty thousand children a day die from preventable diseases.
sentences.cn: 每天有四万儿童死于本可以防止的疾病。

sentences.en: Smoking is the biggest preventable cause of death and disease.
sentences.cn: 吸烟是造成不必要疾病和死亡的最大原因。

sentences.en: It seems to me that this crime was foreseeable and this death preventable.
sentences.cn: 在我看来这罪行是可预见的且这起死亡是可避免的。
